content.raw:
Thanks very much @chrisdembia @traversaro  for the information on relocatable cmake modules, seems to me like the way to go. Just need to check how it affects to debian packages and how to migrate all our software modules to it. I've created an issue in [ign-math](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/issue/24/migrate-to-relocatable-cmake-module) and I will add it to my task list.

I maintain this pull request still in place, since it will help during the transition and allow me to add Windows to our CI cycle.
